SELECT address_id, social_id, recipient_name, road_name_address, lot_number_address, detail_address, postal_code, phone_number, created_at, updated_at FROM shipping_addresses
social_id = #{social_id}

SELECT a.address_id, a.social_id, a.recipient_name, a.road_name_address, a.lot_number_address, a.detail_address, a.postal_code, a.phone_number, a.created_at, a.updated_at FROM shipping_addresses a INNER JOIN customer c ON c.default_address_id = a.address_id
c.social_id = #{social_id}
